mapper.select: SELECT t.*, u.NAME AS UNIT_NAME, v.USERNAME FROM (SELECT a.BILL_CODE AS BILL_CODE, a.UNIT_CODE AS UNIT_CODE, a.DEPT_CODE AS DEPT_CODE, a.ENTRY_DATE AS ENTRY_DATE, a.SERIAL_NUM AS SERIAL_NUM, a.USER_CODE AS USER_CODE, a.USER_DEPT AS USER_DEPT, a.USER_JOB AS USER_JOB, a.USER_CONTACT AS USER_CONTACT, a.BG_NAME AS BG_NAME, a.SYSTEM AS SYSTEM, a.BG_TYPE AS BG_TYPE, a.BG_REASON AS BG_REASON, a.BILL_STATE AS BILL_STATE, a.BILL_USER AS BILL_USER, a.BILL_DATE AS BILL_DATE, a.EFFECTIVE_DATE AS EFFECTIVE_DATE, b.APPROVAL_STATE AS APPROVAL_STATE FROM tb_change_erp_xtbg a left join tb_approval_main b on a.BILL_CODE=b.BILL_CODE) AS t, oa_department u, sys_user v WHERE u.DEPARTMENT_CODE = t.UNIT_CODE AND t.USER_CODE=v.USER_ID AND t.BILL_CODE=#{BILL_CODE}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT t.*, u.NAME AS UNIT_NAME, v.NAME USERNAME, w.NAME DEPT_NAME, x.NAME USER_DEPTNAME FROM (SELECT a.BILL_CODE AS BILL_CODE, a.UNIT_CODE AS UNIT_CODE, a.DEPT_CODE AS DEPT_CODE, a.ENTRY_DATE AS ENTRY_DATE, a.SERIAL_NUM AS SERIAL_NUM, a.USER_CODE AS USER_CODE, a.USER_DEPT AS USER_DEPT, a.USER_JOB AS USER_JOB, a.USER_CONTACT AS USER_CONTACT, a.BG_NAME AS BG_NAME, a.SYSTEM AS SYSTEM, a.BG_TYPE AS BG_TYPE, a.BG_REASON AS BG_REASON, a.BG_NR AS BG_NR, a.BILL_STATE AS BILL_STATE, a.BILL_USER AS BILL_USER, a.BILL_DATE AS BILL_DATE, a.USER_EMAIL USER_EMAIL, a.USER_TEL USER_TEL, a.EFFECTIVE_DATE AS EFFECTIVE_DATE, b.APPROVAL_STATE AS APPROVAL_STATE FROM tb_change_erp_xtbg a LEFT JOIN tb_approval_main b ON a.BILL_CODE=b.BILL_CODE) AS t LEFT JOIN oa_department u ON u.DEPARTMENT_CODE = t.UNIT_CODE LEFT JOIN sys_user v ON t.USER_CODE=v.USER_ID LEFT JOIN oa_department w ON w.DEPARTMENT_CODE = t.DEPT_CODE LEFT JOIN oa_department X ON x.DEPARTMENT_CODE = t.USER_DEPT) AS h where BILL_CODE=#{BILL_CODE}

SELECT a.BILL_CODE, a.UNIT_CODE, a.DEPT_CODE, a.ENTRY_DATE, a.SERIAL_NUM, a.USER_CODE, a.USER_DEPT, a.USER_JOB, a.USER_CONTACT, a.EFFECTIVE_DATE, a.BG_NAME, a.SYSTEM, a.BG_TYPE, a.BG_REASON, a.BG_NR, a.BILL_STATE, a.BILL_USER, a.BILL_DATE, a.USER_EMAIL, a.USER_TEL, a.EFFECTIVE_DATE, b.NAME AS UNIT_NAME, c.USERNAME, c.NAME, d.NAME DEPT_NAME, e.NAME USER_DEPTNAME FROM tb_change_erp_xtbg a LEFT JOIN oa_department b ON b.DEPARTMENT_CODE = a.UNIT_CODE LEFT JOIN sys_user c ON a.USER_CODE=c.USER_ID LEFT JOIN oa_department d ON d.DEPARTMENT_CODE = a.DEPT_CODE left join oa_department e on e.DEPARTMENT_CODE = a.USER_DEPT where a.BILL_CODE =#{BILL_CODE}
